mapper.select: select * from tb_sys_user u where u.loginName=#{loginName}
select ur.role_id from tb_sys_user u, tb_user_role ur where u.userid=ur.user_id and u.loginName=#{loginName}

select p.* from tb_sys_user u, tb_sys_role r, tb_sys_permission p, tb_user_role ur, tb_role_permission rp where u.userid = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = r.role_id and r.role_id = rp.role_id and rp.permission_id = p.permission_id and u.loginName=#{loginName}
